original: Krafft, Gustav Emanuel, läroverksadjunkt, Varberg, f. 14/1/83 i Upps. av folksk :lär. A. G. K. o. Anna Andersson. G. 16 m. Gunhild Andersson. Barn: Lars-Gustav f. 17, Per-Gunnar 20. — Mog:ex. 01, fil. kand. 06 o. efterpr. 07, allt i Upps., provår v. södra latin i Sthlm 07-08. Pedag. stud:resa i Tyskl. 07, geolog, dito i Norge 12. E. lär. i Örebro 08-11, adj. i matem., fysik o. kemi v. Varbergs samrealsk. sed. 11, lär. v. Varbergs tekn. aftonsk. 11-21, v. förest, där 13-14 o. förest. 18-21. Led. av o. sekr. i styr. f. tekn. aftonsk. 17-21, sekr. i Varbergs ork :sällsk. 28-38, ordf. där 38-41. RVO.
translated: Krafft, Gustav Emanuel, teacher's assistant, Varberg, b. 14/1/83 in Uppsala, son of elementary school teacher A.G.K. and Anna Andersson. Married on 16th with Gunhild Andersson. Children: Lars-Gustav b. 17, Per-Gunnar b. 20. Completed the student examination in 1901, Bachelor of Arts in 1906 and certified in 1907, all in Uppsala. Internship at Södra Latin in Stockholm from 1907-1908. Pedagogical study trip to Germany in 1907, geological study trip to Norway in 1912. Elementary school teacher in Örebro from 1908-1911, assistant in mathematics, physics, and chemistry at Varberg's secondary school since 1911. Teacher at Varberg's Technical Evening School from 1911-1921, acting principal there from 1913-1914 and principal from 1918-1921. Member and secretary of the board for the Technical Evening School from 1917-1921, secretary of Varberg's Orchestra Society from 1928-1938, and chairman from 1938-1941. Received the Royal Order of the Vasa.

work.roleName: Assistant in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry
